鎮守府正面海域: Sea in Front of the Naval Base
鎮守府正面近海の\n警備に出動せよ！:
Dispatch a fleet to defend the
close seas of the Naval Base!
南西諸島沖に接近する\n敵前衛艦隊を捕捉、迎撃せよ！:
Intercept the enemy vanguard
fleet that is approaching the
Nansei Islands!
製油所地帯沿岸部の\n海上輸送ラインを防衛せよ！:
Protect the supply lines of the
Coastal Refinery Department!
南西諸島の防衛ライン上の\n敵侵攻艦隊を捕捉、\n全力出撃でこれを撃滅せよ！:
Trap the enemy fleet invading
the Nansei Islands Defense
Line, and crush it with an
all-out sortie!
なるべく小編成の対潜哨戒部隊を\n編成し、鎮守府近海に出没する敵\n潜水艦を捜索:
Set up an anti-submarine
patrol unit as small as
possible, and search for
enemy submarines near the
Naval Base. Capture and
control them to ensure safe
passage in the close waters!
鎮守府近海航路: Sea Route Near the Naval Base
対潜及び防空能力に優れた艦艇\nを基幹戦力とした艦隊を編成、\n輸送船団航路の護:
Form a fleet with superior
anti-submarine and air
defense capabilities as its
core strength and protect the
convoy routes!
艦隊を南西諸島方面に展開！\n同海域の哨戒を実施、同水域に\n侵入した敵を排除、:
Deploy a fleet in the Nansei
Islands' surroundings! Conduct
a patrol in this area, and
eliminate the established
enemy to secure a safe route!
艦隊をバシー海峡に展開せよ！\n同方面の制海権を確保し、南方\nからの資源輸送の:
Deploy a fleet to the Bashi
Island Strait! Secure sea
control in this area to ensure
safe passage of resources
from the south, and
strengthen our defense
system!
オリョール海に進出、同海域を\n哨戒。敵通商破壊艦隊を排除、\n我が方り海上輸送:
Advance to the Orel Sea, and
carry out a patrol in the area.
Eliminate the enemy
commerce-raiding fleet, and
defend our transport line!
沖ノ島海域に襲来した有力な敵\n機動部隊を迎撃する。艦隊全力\n出撃で、これを捕:
Intercept the powerful enemy
task force that is raiding the
Okinoshima Island Area!
Crush it with an all-out sortie!
同方面に敵艦隊接近の兆候が報告\nされた。巡洋艦を中心とした哨戒\n部隊を編成、:
Signs of an approaching
enemy fleet were reported in
this area. Form a patrol force
consisting of a cruiser and
other ships, and find out
about the enemy fleet's
movements.
北方海域に艦隊を進出させ、\nモーレイ海を哨戒せよ！:
Move your fleet to the
Northern Area, and carry out
a patrol in the Moray Sea!
駆逐艦を主力とした高速艦隊で、\n敵に包囲された北方海域キス島に\n突入！守備隊:
With a fast fleet consisting of
destroyers as its main force,
charge into the enemy-held
Kis Island! Get the garrison to
safety!
空母2隻以上を擁する空母機動\n部隊などの有力な艦隊をもって\n北方海域に進出。:
Advance into the Northern
Area with a powerful carrier
task force consisting of two or
more aircraft carriers. Conduct
a reconnaissance of the
enemy's situation with this
force.
北方海域奥地に敵艦隊の大規模\n泊地を発見！我が艦隊の総力を\n挙げてこれを撃滅:
We have discovered a large
enemy anchorage deep in the
Northern Area! Destroy it with
our whole fleet's effort!
北方海域に敵増援の動きがある。\n中規模の水上打撃部隊を派遣し、\n敵増援を捕捉:
Enemy reinforcements are
moving in the Northern Area.
Dispatch a medium-sized
surface strike force to capture
and destroy the enemy
reinforcements.
西方作戦の第一段階として艦隊を\nジャム島攻略に展開！作戦を実施\nせよ！ (対:
Deploy the fleet to capture
Jam Island as part of the first
phase of the western
campaign! Carry this out!
(Stay on anti-submarine alert)
カレー洋の制圧作戦を行う。同方\n面資源地帯を確保しつつ、カレー\n半島水域の敵:
Carry out operations to
control the Curry Seas.
Neutralize the enemy fleet in
the waters of the Curry
Peninsula, and secure the
resource zone in the same
area!
空母を伴った艦隊を編成し、リラ\nンカ島の敵母港に展開する敵艦隊\nへの攻撃を行:
Set up an accompanying fleet
around an aircraft carrier, and
conduct an attack on the
enemy fleet in their home
port! Fleet, sortie to the
Ri-Lanka Island!
カレー洋西方の敵哨戒線を突破、\nカスガダマ島沖深く進出し、敵東\n方艦隊中枢部:
Break through the enemy
patrol line in the western part
of the Curry Sea and advance
deep into the waters off
Casgadama Island to capture
and destroy the enemy's
Eastern Fleet core!
我が艦隊により大打撃を受けた\n敵東洋艦隊がリランカ島の港湾\nに再集結しつつあ:
The enemy Eastern Fleet,
badly battered by our ships,
is regrouping in the harbor of
Ri-Lanka Island. Form a raiding
party and destroy the enemy
reinforcements!
南方海域進出作戦:
The Advance to the
Southern Sea
練度の高い水上打撃部隊を編成\nし、南方海域への進出を図れ！\n艦隊、南方へ進出:
Form a highly-skilled surface
strike force and move into the
southern waters! Fleet, move
to the south!
MO作戦を実施する。空母機動\n部隊を展開、これを支援せよ！\n敵機動部隊を捜索:
Carry out Operation MO.
Deploy a carrier task force,
and send a support fleet
(Expedition 33/34) as well!
Search and destroy the enemy
task force!
第一次サーモン沖海戦: First Battle of the Salmon Sea
鉄底海峡に突入、敵泊地に我が\n水上打撃部隊による夜戦突撃を\n敢行、敵後方の輸:
Charge into the Ironbottom
Strait, and conduct a night
assault with a surface strike
force on the enemy's
anchorage and smash their
rear transports!
南方海域に有力な艦隊を投入し\n鼠輸送作戦を敢行、可能であれ\nば同方面の敵艦隊:
Launch a powerful fleet in the
Southern Area to conduct the
Rat Transport Operation
'Tōkyō Express', and eliminate
the enemy fleet in the area if
possible!
第二次サーモン海戦:
Second Battle of the
Salmon Sea
南方海域に敵の有力な機動部隊\nの接近が確認された。空母機動\n部隊を以て、これ:
A powerful enemy task force
has been confirmed to be
approaching in the Southern
Area. Send a carrier task force
to intercept it!
有力な潜水艦隊を編成し、中部\n海域哨戒線に進出せよ。敵艦隊\nを発見、これを漸:
Form a competent submarine
fleet and move to the Central
Area Patrol Line. Find the
enemy fleet and gradually
destroy it!
MS諸島沖前面に展開し、同諸島\n方面に接近しつつある敵攻略部\n隊を捕捉、全力:
Deploy a fleet off the MS
Islands, capture, and
annihilate the approaching
enemy assault force with an
all-out sortie!
飛行艇または水上偵察機を装備\nした水上機母艦・軽巡・駆逐艦\nによる艦隊を同方:
Advance with a fleet
consisting of AVs, CLs and
DDs, equipped with flying
boats and reconnaissance
seaplanes when applicable,
and conduct the aerial
reconnaissance 'Operation K'!
水雷戦隊を基幹とした攻略部隊\nまたは空母最大二隻を擁する機\n動部隊による中部:
Conduct the Central Area
Isolated Island Recapture
Operation with either a
Torpedo Squadron as an
assault force, or a task force
which includes at most two
aircraft carriers. Fleet, sortie!
KW環礁沖海域: Off the Coast of the KW Atoll
中部海域最前線に有力な敵機動\n部隊が襲来した！同戦域に展開\nする基地航空隊と:
A powerful enemy task force
has attacked the front line in
the Central Area! Intercept
and destroy the enemy fleet
with the support of the
Land-based corps, deployed
in the area!
燃料の豊かなブルネイ泊地近海\nに敵潜水艦の跳梁が見られる。\nこれを捜索制圧し:
Enemy submarines have been
spotted near the fuel-rich
Brunei Anchorage. Search and
suppress the threat to ensure
the safety of this area, which
is a key point!
我が機動部隊の出撃拠点である\nタウイタウイ泊地沖に敵戦力の\n跳梁が確認されて:
A leap of enemy forces has
been observed off the
Tawi-Tawi Anchorage, the
sortie base of our task force.
Patrols should be strictly
enforced and these must be
suppressed!
マラッカ海峡を抜けて:
Passing Through
the Strait of Malacca
精強な重巡及び駆逐艦を中核\nとする小艦隊でマラッカ海峡\nを突破する。ペナン島:
Break through the Strait of
Malacca with a small fleet of
strong heavy cruisers and
destroyers as its core. Defeat
the enemy forces off Penang
Island and advance!
南方から本土方面に重要資源を\n輸送するヒ船団。同船団を敵潜\n及び敵機動部隊か:
The Hi Convoy transports vital
resources from the south to
the mainland. Protect the fleet
from enemy submarines and
task forces by launching a
maritime escort operation!
Weigh anchor!
